name: Bombfall (Mikad0)
description:
You just woke up in this industrial facility, and some mad guys want to kill you. Suddenly bombs start falling from the sky, and you realize they also planted one in your body, and it's going to explode in 45 seconds. There are some defuse boards in the room, you try using them to survive for as long as possible, but it's all in vain:

you can only delay the inevitable.

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move

(Made for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam)
